Class ScreenShotRemoteWebDriver

  • java.lang.Object

    public final class ScreenShotRemoteWebDriver
extends org.openqa.selenium.support.events.EventFiringWebDriver
    An extension of EventFiringWebDriver which provides additional capabilities

      void get(String url)
      Apart from opening up the URL in a browser, this method optionally takes care of logging in the "open" action on to the test report viz., the reports generated via BFReporter.
